Announcement from Coach Lozano!!

Santa Gertrudis Lions- we move into the unknown with UIL and extracurricular activities - it really seems we are at a point where there are more changes expected on the horizon this coming week.

SGISD is committed to keeping our kids safe and we have made the decision to begin the year virtually for the first three weeks of school. Our plan is to remain 100% virtual and that will include our extracurricular activities/practices. These sports/practices are to be resumed in person when we offer face to face instruction to our students beginning Aug 24. I cannot say for certain what changes or guidance will be coming in the future between now and then but we will remain ready to adapt to them and overcome this adversity as a Team.

Workouts will continue to be posted and regular online meetings with your coaches will be scheduled.

I hope this message finds you all healthy and taking care of each other.

Stay Lion Strong and Lion Safe

-Lozano IV
